welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lennox, where small town charm meets big city opportunities! Known for its beautiful parks, delicious local food, and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private flights and charters.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, gift shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Santa Monica Airport caters to private jet owners and their passengers, offering luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport, serving commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Van Nuys Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. No password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi service is available throughout the airport.
